examples.korean: the absorption of immigrants into the host country 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이민을 받아들이는 국가로의 이민 흡수 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: He was criticized for his tough stand on immigration. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 이민에 대한 강경한 태도로 비판을 받았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was criticized for his tough stand on immigration. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The government has adopted an aggressive posture on immigration. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 정부는 이민에 대해 공격적인 자세를 취해 왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The government has adopted an aggressive posture on immigration. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They claimed they were political refugees and not economic migrants. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 자기들이 정치적 난민이지 경제 이민이 아니라고 주장했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They claimed they were political refugees and not economic migrants. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: My grandparents emigrated to Canada to try their luck there. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리 조부모님은 그곳에서 자신들의 운수를 시험해 보기 위해 캐나다로 이민을 가셨다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: My grandparents emigrated to Canada to try their luck there. Add to Wordbook
